translation: Given over to egoism, power, haughtiness, lust, and anger, these malicious people hate Me in their own bodies and in the bodies of others.
commentary: 16.18 Egoism? Balam power? Pride haughtiness? Kamam lust? anger anger? f and? possessed of? Mam Me? in their own bodies and in those of others? hating hating? abhyasuyakaá¸¥ (these) malicious people.Commentary They are selfsufficient and puffed up with mental and material power. They pose too much. They resent it much if they are belittled. The body is dearer
